name: Wolverine
text: Healing Factor - Response: After the player phase begins, heal 2 damage.

name: Logan
text: Snikt! - Setup: Search your deck and discard pile for the Wolverine's Claws upgrade and put it into play.

name: Wolverine's Claws
text: Permanent. Hero Action: Exhaust Wolverine's Claws, choose en [[ATTACK]] event in your hand, and take damage equal to its printed cost → play that event, ignoring its resource cost. That attack gains piercing.

name: Jubilee
text: Response: After Jubilee enters play, choose an enemy. Until the end of the phase, while Wolverine or Jubilee is making a basic attack against that enemy, they get +2 ATK for that attack.

name: Adamantium Skeleton
text:
You get +4 hit points.
Wolverine gets +1 ATK and his basic attacks gain piercing.

name: Berserker Frenzy
text: Hero Response: After Wolverine takes any amount of damage from an enemy attack, draw 1 card. Forced Response: After you flip to alter-ego form, discard this card.

name: "I Got Better"
text: Interrupt: When you would be defeated by an enemy attack, instead set your hit point dial to 5, ready your identity, and discard this card.

name: Logan's Cabin
text: Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Logan's Cabin → shuffle 1 Wolverine card from you discard pile into your deck.

name: Berserker Barrage
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 4 damage to an enemy. If this attack defeats an enemy, you may take 2 damage → repeat this ability.

name: Slice and Dice
text: Hero Action: Make the following 2 attacks in order: • Deal 3 damage to an enemy. • Deal 3 damage to an enemy.

name: Lunging Strike
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 8 damage to an enemy. If you exhausted Wolverine's Claws to play this card, this attack gains overkill.

name: Track by Scent
text: Hero Action (thwart): Remove 3 threat from a scheme. If this removes the last threat from that scheme, draw 2 cards.

name: Regenerative Healing
text: Action: Choose: • Heal 4 damage from your identity. • Discard each stunned and confused status card from your identity.

name: Psylocke
text: Psylocke enters play with 2 psionic counters on her. [star] Interrupt: When Psylocke attacks an enemy, remove 1 psionic counter from her → confuse that enemy and deal 1 damage to it.

name: Sunfire
text: Response: After you play Sunfire from your hand, spend a [energy] resource → choose an attachment with the text "Hero Action" or "Hero Response" and discard it.

name: Battle Fury
text: Play under any player's control. Max 1 per player. Response: After your hero attacks and defeats a minion, deal 1 damage to your hero and discard Battle Fury → ready your hero.

name: Warrior Skill
text: Uses (3 warrior counters). Max 1 per player. Interrupt: When your hero attacks, remove 1 counter from here → that attacks deals 1 additional damage.

name: Outta My Way!
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 3 damage to an enemy (5 damage instead if that enemy has the guard or patrol keyword).

name: Precision Strike
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 2 damage to an enemy. If this attack defeats that enemy, heal 2 damage from your hero.

name: Mean Swing
text: Hero Interrupt: When your hero makes a basic attack, exhaust a [[WEAPON]] upgrade on your hero → your hero gets +3 ATK for this attack.

name: Weapon X
text: Play only if your identity has the [[MUTANT]] trait. Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Weapon X and take 1 damage → discard cards from your deck until you discard an identity-specific card, then add that card to your hand.

name: Fastball Special
text: Team-Up (Colossus and Wolverine). Max 1 per deck. Hero Action (attack): Deal X damage to an enemy, where X is the total ATK of Colossus and Wolverine. This attack gains overkill and piercing.

name: Command Center
text: Max 1 per player. Response: After an ally thwarts and defeats a side scheme, exhaust Command Center → deal 2 damage to an enemy.

name: Longshot
text: Play only if your identity has the [[X-MEN]] trait. [star] Response: After Longshot attacks a non-[[ELITE]] minion, discard the top card of the encounter deck. If that card has a star icon ([star]) in the boost area, defeat the attacked minion.
